java/liquibase/change/CreateTableChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.*;
00005 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00012 
00013 import java.util.ArrayList;
00014 import java.util.HashSet;
00015 import java.util.List;
00016 import java.util.Set;
00017 
00021 public class CreateTableChange extends AbstractChange {
00022 
00023     private List<ColumnConfig> columns;
00024     private String schemaName;
00025     private String tableName;
00026     private String tablespace;
00027     private String remarks;
00028 
00029     public CreateTableChange() {
00030         super("createTable", "Create Table");
00031         columns = new ArrayList<ColumnConfig>();
00032     }
00033 
00034     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00035 
00036         String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null ? database.getDefaultSchemaName() : getSchemaName();
00037         CreateTableStatement statement = new CreateTableStatement(schemaName, getTableName());
00038         for (ColumnConfig column : getColumns()) {
00039             ConstraintsConfig constraints = column.getConstraints();
00040             boolean isAutoIncrement = column.isAutoIncrement() != null && column.isAutoIncrement();
00041             if (constraints != null && constraints.isPrimaryKey() != null && constraints.isPrimaryKey()) {
00042 
00043                 statement.addPrimaryKeyColumn(column.getName(),
00044                         database.getColumnType(column.getType(), isAutoIncrement));
00045 
00046             } else {
00047                 String defaultValue = null;
00048                 if (column.hasDefaultValue()) {
00049                     defaultValue = StringUtils.trimToNull(column.getDefaultColumnValue(database));
00050                 }
00051                 statement.addColumn(column.getName(),
00052                         database.getColumnType(column.getType(), column.isAutoIncrement()),
00053                         defaultValue);
00054             }
00055 
00056 
00057             if (constraints != null) {
00058                 if (constraints.isNullable() != null && !constraints.isNullable()) {
00059                     statement.addColumnConstraint(new NotNullConstraint(column.getName()));
00060                 }
00061 
00062                 if (constraints.getReferences() != null) {
00063                     if (StringUtils.trimToNull(constraints.getForeignKeyName()) == null) {
00064                         throw new UnsupportedChangeException("createTable with references requires foreignKeyName");
00065                     }
00066                     ForeignKeyConstraint fkConstraint = new ForeignKeyConstraint(constraints.getForeignKeyName(), constraints.getReferences());
00067                     fkConstraint.setColumn(column.getName());
00068                     fkConstraint.setDeleteCascade(constraints.isDeleteCascade() != null && constraints.isDeleteCascade());
00069                     fkConstraint.setInitiallyDeferred(constraints.isInitiallyDeferred() != null && constraints.isInitiallyDeferred());
00070                     fkConstraint.setDeferrable(constraints.isDeferrable() != null && constraints.isDeferrable());
00071                     statement.addColumnConstraint(fkConstraint);
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 if (constraints.isUnique() != null && constraints.isUnique()) {
00075                     statement.addColumnConstraint(new UniqueConstraint(constraints.getUniqueConstraintName()).addColumns(column.getName()));
00076                 }
00077             }
00078 
00079             if (isAutoIncrement) {
00080                 statement.addColumnConstraint(new AutoIncrementConstraint(column.getName()));
00081             }
00082         }
00083 
00084         statement.setTablespace(StringUtils.trimToNull(getTablespace()));
00085 
00086         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00087         statements.add(statement);
00088 
00089         return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);
00090     }
00091 
00092     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00093         DropTableChange inverse = new DropTableChange();
00094         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00095         inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00096 
00097         return new Change[]{
00098                 inverse
00099         };
00100     }
00101 
00102     public List<ColumnConfig> getColumns() {
00103         return columns;
00104     }
00105 
00106     public String getSchemaName() {
00107         return schemaName;
00108     }
00109 
00110     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00111         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00112     }
00113 
00114     public String getTableName() {
00115         return tableName;
00116     }
00117 
00118     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00119         this.tableName = tableName;
00120     }
00121 
00122 
00123     public String getTablespace() {
00124         return tablespace;
00125     }
00126 
00127     public void setTablespace(String tablespace) {
00128         this.tablespace = tablespace;
00129     }
00130 
00131     public void addColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00132         columns.add(column);
00133     }
00134 
00135     public String getRemarks() {
00136         return remarks;
00137     }
00138 
00139     public void setRemarks(String remarks) {
00140         this.remarks = remarks;
00141     }
00142 
00143     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00144         return "Table " + tableName + " created";
00145     }
00146 
00147     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00148         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("createTable");
00149         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00150             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00151         }
00152 
00153         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00154         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(tablespace) != null) {
00155             element.setAttribute("tablespace", tablespace);
00156         }
00157         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(remarks) != null) {
00158             element.setAttribute("remarks", remarks);
00159         }
00160         for (ColumnConfig column : getColumns()) {
00161             element.appendChild(column.createNode(currentChangeLogFileDOM));
00162         }
00163         return element;
00164     }
00165 
00166     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00167         Set<DatabaseObject> returnSet = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00168 
00169         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00170         returnSet.add(table);
00171 
00172         for (ColumnConfig columnConfig : getColumns()) {
00173             Column column = new Column();
00174             column.setTable(table);
00175             column.setName(columnConfig.getName());
00176 
00177             returnSet.add(column);
00178         }
00179 
00180         return returnSet;
00181     }
00182 }
